description: The migrate_and_destroy() function uses selfdestruct which sends the contract's balance to a specified address. Additionally, any contract can be forced to receive Ether via selfdestruct from another contract. If contract logic depends on address(this).balance, it can be manipulated.
fix_description: Do not rely on address(this).balance for contract logic. Track received Ether explicitly using state variables that are only updated in payable functions.
